content: Whomever it was in the White House who set up the Nunes stunt should be put in jail. They were mishandling classified information for political purposes and intentionally tried to deceive a congressional committee by having Nunes claim he received the information from a whistleblower type. Nunes also gave a lot of flimsy excuses why he would not reveal who he got the information from, like fear of retaliation or something like that. It was all bogus and meant to be deceptive so it was illegal.
